channel.title: Recolor help
channel.description:
Hey i was wondering if somone could recolor a few items for me. Recoloring dont take long, but i can't seem to do it D: If you do it ill know how though.
Heres the code: [code]if(i == 7601){class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1];class8.anIntArray156[0] = 7604;class8.anIntArray156[0] = 7604;class8.anIntArray160[0] = 7604;class8.anIntArray160[0] = 7604;class8.anInt174 = 4671;class8.anInt181 = 490;class8.anInt190 = 344;class8.anInt198 = 192;class8.anInt204 = 138;class8.anInt199 = -1;class8.anInt169 = 1;class8.anInt194 = 20;class8.anInt165 = 4672;class8.anInt200 = 4672;class8.anInt175 = 56;class8.anInt197 = 116;class8.anInt164 = -1;class8.anInt188 = -1;class8.aBoolean176 = false;class8.aString170 = "Rune defender";class8.aByteArray178 = "A defensive weapon.".getBytes(); }[/code] I want it to be red pls, like dragon red.
Heres the second code. [code]if(i == 7605){class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";class8.anInt174 = 4678;class8.anInt181 = 595;class8.anInt190 = 0;class8.anInt198 = 0;class8.anInt204 = 0;class8.anInt199 = 0;class8.anInt169 = 0;class8.anInt194 = 0;class8.anInt165 = 4679;class8.anInt200 = 4680;class8.anInt175 = 56;class8.anInt197 = 116;class8.anInt164 = -1;class8.anInt188 = -1;class8.aBoolean176 = false;class8.aString170 = "Dragon Boots";class8.aByteArray178 = "These will protect my feet.".getBytes(); }[/code] I would like them to be lava, i understand that is possible.
Pls and Thank you.

item.title: Recolor help
item.dc:creator: @superxero superxero
item.description:
@superxero wrote:

Hey i was wondering if somone could recolor a few items for me. Recoloring dont take long, but i canâ€™t seem to do it D: If you do it ill know how though.

Heres the code:

if(i == 7601){class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1];class8.anIntArray156[0] = 7604;class8.anIntArray156[0] = 7604;class8.anIntArray160[0] = 7604;class8.anIntArray160[0] = 7604;class8.anInt174 = 4671;class8.anInt181 = 490;class8.anInt190 = 344;class8.anInt198 = 192;class8.anInt204 = 138;class8.anInt199 = -1;class8.anInt169 = 1;class8.anInt194 = 20;class8.anInt165 = 4672;class8.anInt200 = 4672;class8.anInt175 = 56;class8.anInt197 = 116;class8.anInt164 = -1;class8.anInt188 = -1;class8.aBoolean176 = false;class8.aString170 = "Rune defender";class8.aByteArray178 = "A defensive weapon.".getBytes();        }

I want it to be red pls, like dragon red.

Heres the second code.

if(i == 7605){class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";class8.anInt174 = 4678;class8.anInt181 = 595;class8.anInt190 = 0;class8.anInt198 = 0;class8.anInt204 = 0;class8.anInt199 = 0;class8.anInt169 = 0;class8.anInt194 = 0;class8.anInt165 = 4679;class8.anInt200 = 4680;class8.anInt175 = 56;class8.anInt197 = 116;class8.anInt164 = -1;class8.anInt188 = -1;class8.aBoolean176 = false;class8.aString170 = "Dragon Boots";class8.aByteArray178 = "These will protect my feet.".getBytes();        }

I would like them to be lava, i understand that is possible.

Pls and Thank you.
